body: Lol hardships. She says in the interview that she's happy all said and done. Personally, this is a really appealing ending for me considering this is a corruption type manga. Usually, these end with the girl becoming a ganguro slut with a hundred piercings and tattoos
This is basically sakura and sasuke in a nutshell.
I feel bad after reading this. Didn't know the hardships of a JAV actress unil now. Someone should translate this so that people will respect JAV actresses.
